channel.title: Spec+donator=100 errors (rep++)

item.title: Spec+donator=100 errors (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:14, topic:408177”]Either try this, or add another bracket too ^

if(objectID == 409){ if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { sM("You already have full Prayer points."); } else { if (donator > 1) { setAnimation(645); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687); sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + "", 4013); sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); } else { if(donator < 1) { specialAmount == 100; sM("@red@Because you're a donator, you're spec re-charges."); } } } }[/quote]
Spec is suppose to be:
specialAmount += 100;

but it worked thanks repped

Read full topic

item.title: Spec+donator=100 errors (rep++)

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Either try this, or add another bracket to ^

item.title: Spec+donator=100 errors (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @ArticBlooms ArticBlooms
item.description:
@ArticBlooms wrote:

I’m pretty sure that it should be like this

if(objectID == 409){ if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { sM("You already have full Prayer points."); } else { setAnimation(645); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687); sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + "", 4013); sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); specialAmount == 100 && (donator < 1)); sM("@red@Because you're a donator, you're spec re-charges."); } }
